text: Saulieu, Burgundian: Saûyeu, is a commune in the arrondissement of Montbard in the Côte-d'Or department in eastern France. It is the capital of the Morvan Region. About 2,500 people were living in Saulieu in 2015. == Well-known people == * Yves Afonso, actor Category:Communes in Côte-d'Or
title: Saulieu
